title: This woman entrepreneur is helping Indian women get high-paying tech jobs after a career break - YourStory
content: This woman entrepreneur is helping Indian women get high-paying tech jobs after a career break  YourStory
description: Pooja Bangad witnessed the gap in the representation of women in tech in mid and senior-level roles and decided to disrupt the industry by starting SheWork. Read on to know how sheâ€™s bringing women in tech back to work.
